metadata.title: CVE-2023-28938 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - low
metadata.description:
Uncontrolled resource consumption in some Intel(R) SSD Tools softwarebefore version mdadm-4.2-rc2 may allow a priviledged user to potentiallyenable denial of service via local access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-28938` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mdadm - 4.2+20230508-6ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mdadm package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.2+20230508-6ubuntu1').
